Articles.Content:
I've begun a space tourism adventure in my save where I take average, everyday kerbals to spce. For a week. The only problem with this is that after they come back I can't get them out of the VAB, and I don't need/want the entire population of kerb in hanging out in my VAB, especially since they are only going to be used for the one mission.

Is there a way to delete them from the. Persistence file so that they are not cluttering up the place?
Edit the persistent.sfs file with a text editor. The crew ROSTER is at the end of the file.

Turn off crew respawn.

In the save file change the "MissingCrewsRespawn" from "True" to "False".

Murder them.
Or just take them on weeklong tourist expeditions into space...and leave them there.
you could always have them eva in the upper atmosphere on the return trip

I am horrified by these suggestions! To waste Kerbals is a crime! So, load up the Kethane mod, attach a KEÃ¢â‚¬â€œWAITNONOSTOPÃ¢â‚¬â€œ01 Kerbal Unreconstitutionator and turn them into useful fuel. *evil laugh*

I am horrified by these suggestions! To waste Kerbals is a crime! So, load up the Kethane mod, attach a KEÃ¢â‚¬â€œWAITNONOSTOPÃ¢â‚¬â€œ01 Kerbal Unreconstitutionator and turn them into useful fuel. *evil laugh*

I approve of this approach to solving the problem.

I can just imagine the tourists arriving home and being ushered into a debriefing area, where they have a convenient travelator that drops them into a grinder.
Ah yes, nothing says "best vacation EVAR" like being dropped into a fuel converter!

Ah yes, nothing says "best vacation EVAR" like being dropped into a fuel converter!

Thanks a lot. Now I have to add a new wireless keyboard to the computer I am building next week. (mops up coffee out of KB with tissue....)

I am horrified by these suggestions! To waste Kerbals is a crime! So, load up the Kethane mod, attach a KEÃ¢â‚¬â€œWAITNONOSTOPÃ¢â‚¬â€œ01 Kerbal Unreconstitutionator and turn them into useful fuel. *evil laugh*

Wait, does Kethane seriously have this? I haven't used that mod in a while, maybe I should get it again. *also evil laughs*

Wait, does Kethane seriously have this? I haven't used that mod in a while, maybe I should get it again. *also evil laughs*

Here's the link to the Kethane wiki: https://github.com/Majiir/Kethane/wiki/KEÃ¢â‚¬â€œWAITNONOSTOPÃ¢â‚¬â€œ01-Kerbal-Unreconstitutionator

Wait, does Kethane seriously have this? I haven't used that mod in a while, maybe I should get it again. *also evil laughs*

Indeed it does. Unfortunately, the first time I tried it, it left me with ship that had no pilot...
